instruction: Generate a story in which a character has a difficult decision to make
output: Once upon a time there was a young man named Tom who was faced with a difficult decision. He had been offered a new job that would take him to a different city, but it meant leaving behind his family and friends. He was torn between the opportunity for a fresh start and his love for his community. He spent many nights pondering the decision and realized that whatever he chose, it would be a sacrifice. In the end, he decided to take the risk and move to the new city. Little did he know, the decision would change his life forever.
